solution.title: Blink Business Intelligence is a dynamic company dedicated to providing intelligent solutions that enhance and streamline business processes. Our mission is to empower businesses with efficient tools that optimize their operations, enabling them to stay ahead in today's fast-paced and competitive market.

items.title: Our Journey:
items.desc: Blink Business Intelligence was founded by a team of three individuals who shared a common vision. Two of our founders have a strong engineering background, while the third possesses invaluable sales expertise. With our combined skills and passion for innovation, we set out on a mission to revolutionize the way businesses handle their HR management processes..

items.title: Our Talented Team:
items.desc: Behind Blink Business Intelligence is a team of talented and driven individuals. Our engineers, all hailing from Azerbaijan, possess a deep understanding of cutting-edge technologies and are committed to developing innovative solutions that meet the unique needs of our clients. Together, we strive to exceed expectations and drive sustainable growth for businesses across industries.

items.title: Advantages of Choosing Blink Business Intelligence:
items.desc: When you partner with Blink Business Intelligence, you gain access to a range of benefits that set us apart from the competition:.

itemsLeft.title: Notable Achievements:
itemsLeft.desc: We are proud to have received official recognition from the government, earning the prestigious `Startup status`. This acknowledgment underscores our commitment to innovation and highlights the potential impact of our intelligent solutions on businesses.

itemsLeft.title: Making a Difference:
itemsLeft.desc: Through our HR management product, we empower companies to manage their HR processes efficiently and intelligently. By automating time-consuming tasks and providing valuable insights, we help businesses unlock their full potential, enabling them to focus on strategic initiatives and drive growth.We welcome you to become part of our growing community of forward-thinking businesses. Discover the power of intelligent solutions and revolutionize your HR management processes with Blink Business Intelligence.

itemsLeft.title: Looking Ahead:
itemsLeft.desc: Our vision for the future is to expand our product offerings and forge strategic partnerships to address a wider range of business challenges. By continuously pushing boundaries and embracing innovation, we aim to be the go-to provider of intelligent solutions that transform businesses.Thank you for considering Blink Business Intelligence. We are excited to embark on this journey with you and support your business's success.

listItems: Security, Speed, and Reliability: Our product prioritizes the security and privacy of your data, ensuring that it remains protected at all times. Coupled with high-speed performance and reliable infrastructure, our solution keeps your business running seamlessly.

Data Integrity: We understand the critical importance of maintaining data integrity. Our product ensures that data received and generated through our system retains its accuracy and consistency, giving you confidence in decision-making processes.

Compliance with Laws and Regulations: With ever-evolving legal requirements, ensuring compliance can be a daunting task. Our program is designed to facilitate business processes in full adherence to relevant laws and regulations, minimizing the risk of non-compliance.

Fast and Professional Support: We take pride in delivering exceptional customer support. Our dedicated team is readily available to address any queries or concerns promptly, ensuring a smooth user experience and minimal disruptions to your operations.

serviceDetails.title: Fast - Secure - Reliable
serviceDetails.desc: Our microservices-driven system, powered by Apache Kafka, excels in speed, security, and reliability.
serviceDetails.desc2: By adopting a microservices architecture and harnessing the power of Apache Kafka, our system has been optimized for exceptional speed, security, and reliability. Microservices enable us to break down complex applications into smaller, manageable components, allowing for rapid development and scalability while ensuring fault isolation. Kafka acts as the central nervous system, efficiently handling data streaming and messaging between these microservices, resulting in a robust and highly available system that can handle real-time data processing and communication with confidence and ease.

serviceList.title: Building Organizational Structure
listItems: • Completely flexible
• No naming dependencies
• No solid structure dependencies
• Entire organizational structure change management

serviceList2.title: Recruitment BP (integrated with EMAS system)
listItems: • Registration of new employees manually or getting available information by FIN & MYI (Ministry of Internal Affairs & State Migration Services APIs)

serviceListVac.title: End-to-end vacation business process management
listItems: • Creation of vacation request
• Step-by-step vacation approval matrix
• HR review and interference in case of necessity to entire BP

serviceList4.title: Business Trip BP
listItems: • Business Trip fee calculation
• Business Trip inventory management

serviceList5.title: Salary and Tax Calculations BP
listItems: • Automatic Salary Calculation
• Automatic Tax Calculation and Report Creation

serviceList6.title: EDMS (Integrated with SIMA)
listItems: • Embedded default documents (ex: labor contract)
• Creation of enterprise document patterns
• Document signing BP
• Signing documents with SIMA digital signature application

serviceList7.title: Internal Communications
listItems: • Internal chat system
• Task management
•Meeting setting (online integrated with Microsoft Teams / offline events)

serviceList8.title: Automatic Salary Payments (Integrated with Bank)
listItems: • After automatic salary calculation and approval of HR and Accounting employees in charge automatic salary transfers to salary card accounts. (Integrated with Bank)

serviceList9.title: System Approvals
listItems: All BP management steps are managed by system approves based on approval matrixes set through our system

serviceListEnd.title: End-to-end recruitment business process management
listItems: • Creation of position
• Automatic creation of application form by new employee for vacant position
• System approves of new recruitment by management
• Automatic creation of final order document
Creation of labor contract in accordance with laws and regulations
Integration with The Ministry of Labor and Social Protection (EMAS system)

clearDataDetails.title: Clear Data-Clear View
clearDataDetails.desc: All data that is provided to and generated from Blink-HR is validated and filtrated. Integrity of data is an important aspect for any institution. So that, with clear data it would be very easy for institutions to use this data in Data Analysis projects. Blink-HR presents nice informative dashboards that are very user-friendly. But for further and more in-depth data analysis projects our product provides validated clear data. Data insertion in our product is mostly done through data-catalogue model (drop-down data insertion)

lawsDetails.title: In compliance with the laws&regulations
lawsDetails.desc: All business processes and calculations are designed to be proceed in compliance with Labour Code of the Ministry of Labour and Social Protection of Population and taxation laws of State Tax Service under the Ministry of the Economy. In case of updates to laws and regulations our team releases immediate software updates and announces about them through web-site and personal contact channels.
lawsDetails.desc2: More than that, based on data collected during daily business processes our product automatically creates necessary report named Unified Declaration to be presented to Ministry of Labor and Population Protection of the Republic of Azerbaijan every month.

blogDetails.title: Business strategy consulting imperdiet
blogDetails.para1: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful. Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure. To take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it? But who has any right to find fault with a man who chooses to enjoy a pleasure that has no annoying consequences, or one who avoids a pain that produces no resultant pleasure?
